data_table.description: The sample attributes data table includes shareid, SHARe sample ID for 100K, 550K, and OMNI5.0 genotype samples, sample analyte type (DNA), body site where samples were collected, plate and well information, high flag, and DNA amplification status.

variable.name: sampid
variable.description: Sample ID - SHARe genotyped sample ID

variable.name: BODY_SITE
variable.description: Body site - values include blood, cell line, or serum

variable.name: plate_well
variable.description: The well designation in AFFYMETRIX and Illumina production manifests

variable.name: high_flag
variable.description: Value equals 1 for the unique sample to be used (useful if multiple samples from the same subject are present) in the original SHARe genotyping; value equals 2 for the unique samples with OMNI5.0 chip genotyping
variable.value: unique sample to be used (useful if multiple samples from the same subject are present) in the original SHARe genotyping
unique samples with OMNI5.0 chip genotyping

variable.name: WGA
variable.description: This has a value of 1 in cases where DNA was amplified. A subset of the blood samples were amplified for SHARe; none for OMNI5.0; all serum samples were amplified in SHARe.
